Text.content:
An element group is a content element, which references a group of other content elements. Find out, how to use it.

Element groups do not work with nested containers. You may prefer reuse model groups instead.
Element groups are deprecated and may be removed in upcoming OpenCms versions. At the moment they are still present, but to see them in the "Add wizard", configure them in a module or sitemap configuration.
